home.title: Passion Dental – Professional Dental Care in Da Nang
home.description: Passion Dental provides comprehensive dental services in Da Nang, including dental implants, orthodontics, porcelain restorations, and general dentistry. Professional care supported by advanced technology and an experienced team of dentists.

about.title: About Passion Dental – Professional Dental Specialists in Da Nang
about.description: Passion Dental is led by Specialist Level I Dr. Dang Hoang Thanh Tung – Implant expert, and Dr. Nguyen Bao Yen – Orthodontic specialist. With a Right – Sufficient – Beautiful treatment philosophy, we are committed to long-lasting and sustainable results.

services.title: Dental Services – Passion Dental Da Nang
services.description: Comprehensive dental services at Passion Dental: orthodontics (braces), dental implants, aesthetic porcelain restorations, and general dentistry. FDA/CE-approved materials and Ministry of Health–standard sterilization protocols.

general.title: General Dentistry – Passion Dental Da Nang
general.description: General dentistry at Passion Dental: teeth cleaning, aesthetic fillings, root canal treatment, wisdom tooth extraction, periodontal therapy, teeth whitening, and gummy smile treatment. Comprehensive diagnostics with strict safety protocols.

orthodontic.title: Orthodontics (Braces) – Passion Dental Da Nang
orthodontic.description: Professional orthodontic treatment at Passion Dental: metal/ceramic braces and clear aligners (Invisalign/ClearCorrect). Dr. Nguyen Bao Yen specializes in the Sato philosophy and MEAW technique. Lifetime support after treatment.

implant.title: Dental Implants – Passion Dental Da Nang
implant.description: Professional implant dentistry at Passion Dental: Specialist Level I Dr. Dang Hoang Thanh Tung – Implant expert with Zygomatic Implant certification. Genuine implant systems from Nobel/Straumann/Osstem, 3D Cone Beam CT, and lifetime warranty.

porcelain.title: Aesthetic Porcelain Restorations – Passion Dental Da Nang
porcelain.description: Aesthetic porcelain restorations at Passion Dental: porcelain veneers, zirconia/Emax/Lava crowns. Digital Smile Design (DSD), minimally invasive preparation, and genuine materials with warranty. Personally examined and designed by Dr. Nguyen Bao Yen.

booking.title: Book an Appointment – Contact Passion Dental Da Nang
booking.description: Schedule a free consultation at Passion Dental Da Nang. Meet our specialists, receive personalized treatment planning, and enjoy fully confidential information handling.

diary.title: Smile Journal – Patient Photos & Reviews – Passion Dental
diary.description: Explore real before-and-after cases at Passion Dental: implants, orthodontics, porcelain restorations, and general treatments. Authentic patient video reviews and testimonials.

blog.title: Dental Blog & Oral Health Knowledge – Passion Dental
blog.description: Dental knowledge, oral care tips, and treatment insights from Passion Dental. Regularly updated with professional oral health information.

knowledge.title: Knowledge – Passion Dental
knowledge.description: Knowledge from Passion Dental. Regularly updated with professional oral health information.
